aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description:
I started as a test engineer for 4 years, using different types of testing such as Unit testing and End-to-End testing. These experiences helped me develop a keen eye for detail.
After that, I got interested in front-end development. I learned about React and Vue.js, and in my first job as a front-end developer, I made over 20 pages for both mobile and desktop displays using Vue.js, SASS, BEM, and Bootstrap-Vue.
Later, I worked with React, Axios, TypeScript, and Styled-Components on projects in Europe.
I worked with many team members and liked working together using Agile methods and Scrum.
I firmly believe that tools are important, but it's even more important to be excited about learning. That's what helps both companies and developers grow.

ventureLeap.name: Venture Leap
ventureLeap.description: As a member of Probatix's Cockpit project, I contributed to the development of a cutting-edge Lab administration solution. I developed and maintained the fronten portion of the Cockpit dashboard, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and a user-friendly interface. Through code reviews and troubleshooting, I fostered a culture of high-quality code and continuous improvement.
ventureLeap.skills: React - TypeScript - CSS - HTML - Axios - Styled-component - GitHub - Figma - Symfony - Scrum

Lastsecond.name: Lastsecond
Lastsecond.description: As the front-end developer at LastSecond.ir, I successfully revamped the company's website, implementing Vue.js and Sass to create a mobile and desktop. friendly design. This project included rewriting the main pages for tours, hotels,flights, itineraries, blogs, restaurants, videos, and attractions. Through effective communication and collaboration with backend developers, UI/UX designers, and the product manager, I ensured alignment with project objectives.
Lastsecond.skills: Vue.js - Bootstrap-Vue - HTML - Javasciprt - SASS - Linux - GitLab - Zeplin - Scrum

Chargoon.name: Chargoon
Chargoon.description: As a Manual Tester at Chargoon, tested three platforms using TFS, collaborating with a team of 10+ developers, 3 scrum masters, and 2 test engineers for efficient testing.
Chargoon.skills: TFS - Unit testing - End to End testing - Integration test - Scrum
